name: College Hub
title: College Website
shortInfo: This is a College Hub Project using MERN stack.

feature.first: Responsive Interface: The project is created while keeping the UI compatible for both Desktop and Mobile.
feature.second: Authentication: Normal registration as well as third-party authentications (Google) are used. There are certain routes that are accessible only after you login or register through any of the given options. Also, there are certain features that are only accessible if your role matches the requirement.
feature.third: Dynamic Data: Express.js & MongoDB is used for the CRUD operations.
